etc.param: #0’s young daughter would spend Christmas alone because she would make a living by herself.
#0 would consume dozens of pills on a fateful Christmas day.
#0 would cry alone as their loved one left them.
#0 would receive the news of the loved one's death under the splendidly decorated Christmas tree.
#0 would be run over by a truck full of gifts on Christmas eve, and would never be able to walk again.
#0 would be told by a doctor that they had a terminal illness.
#0's house would collapse under the weight of the snow on the roof and none would survive. All this would happen a few years later on Christmas day.
